product_name: The North Face Apex Lite Jacket - Men's
long_description: Perfect for cool weather runs, The North Face Apex Lite jacket resists water and wind without compromising breathability. Polyester shell features FlashDry(TM) technology, dramatically improving dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. Mesh ventilation promotes airflow, so you won't overheat. Zip chest pocket holds keys, ID and a gel. Cord hole in pocket lets you tote your tunes. Reflective logos on The North Face Apex Lite jacket boost your visibility to motorists.
short_description: Perfect for cool weather runs, The North Face Apex Lite jacket resists water and wind without compromising breathability.
